text:
e="preserve">Palle Kjærulff-Schmidt (7 July 1931 – 14 March 2018) was a Danish movie director and screenwriter. He directed 32 movies between 1957 and 1995. His 1964 movie "To" was entered into the 15th Berlin International Film Festival. Two years later, his 1967 movie "Story of Barbara" was entered into the 17th Berlin International Film Festival.
In 1965, he co-produced the movie "4x4" and it was entered into the 4th Moscow International Film Festival.
Kjærulff-Schmidt died after a short illness at the age of 86.
